Title: Goa
Writer: Venkat Prabhu (story), Surya (screenplay), Surya (dialogue), Chandan Shetty (lyricist), K. Kalyan (lyricist)
Actors: Komal Kumar, Tarun Chandra, Srikanth, Sharmiela Mandre
Plot: Three youths are born and brought up in a village. Their dream is to marry foreigners and live a fancy life abroad. To materialize their dream, they set off to Goa. Will they hit the jackpot there?
